data.title: How Being Jewish Changed Proust’s Life
data.meta_description: A New Book and a Separate Exhibition in Paris Focus on the Jewishness of the Author of ‘In Search of Lost Time.’ ‘Everybody Knew That He Was half-Jewish and Gay,’ One Expert Says, but the Jewish Influence on His Writing Is Only Becoming Clear Now
